translations: adj.可传达的；会传染的；爱说话的

sentences.sentence: Communicable diseases are the leading cause of death in Sudan.
sentences.translation: 传染病是苏丹的主要死亡原因。

sentences.sentence: Many in the WHO Secretariat were big communicable-disease characters.
sentences.translation: 世卫组织秘书处中的许多人是传染病领域的知名人士。

sentences.sentence: Serogroup a has been confirmed by the National Institute of Communicable Diseases (NICD).
sentences.translation: 血清组a已经国家传染病研究所确认。
